Name: Frequency of \Reviewer Invitation Reminder 1\ sent before \SW-Reviewer Agreed\
Metric: Frequency of activity 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 1' for cases where activity 'SW-Reviewer Agreed' occurs

Name: Percentage of manuscripts that received a \Reviewer Invitation Reminder 1\ before receiving a \SW-Reviewer Agreed\
Metric: Percentage of 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 1' out of all 'SW-Reviewer Agreed'

Name: Number of \Reviewer Invitation Reminder 1\ sent per case
Metric: Number of 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 1' activities grouped by the last value of code

Name: Percentage of \Reviewer Invitation Reminder 1\ followed by \SW-Reviewer Declined\
Metric: Percentage of 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 1' out of all 'SW-Reviewer Declined'

Name: Frequency of \Reviewer Invitation Reminder 1\ in relation to total reminders sent
Metric: Percentage of 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 1' out of all 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 2'

Name: Number of \Reviewer Invitation Reminder 1\ sent after \SW-AE Assign Reviewers\
Metric: Frequency of activity 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 1' for cases where activity 'SW-AE Assign Reviewers' occurs

Name: Percentage of \Reviewer Invitation Reminder 1\ that lead to \SW-Reviewer Agreed\ within 7 days
Metric: Percentage of 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 1' out of all 'SW-Reviewer Agreed'

Name: Frequency of \Reviewer Invitation Reminder 1\ in manuscripts that undergo \SW-EIC Major Revision\
Metric: Frequency of activity 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 1' for cases where activity 'SW-EIC Major Revision' occurs

Name: Percentage of \Reviewer Invitation Reminder 1\ in manuscripts that are eventually accepted (\RW-EIC Accept\)
Metric: Percentage of 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 1' out of all 'RW-EIC Accept'

Name: Number of \Reviewer Invitation Reminder 1\ followed by \Assign a Different Editor\
Metric: Frequency of activity 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 1' for cases where activity 'Assign a Different Editor' occurs

Name: Percentage of \Reviewer Invitation Reminder 1\ in the variant leading to \Manuscript Export Succeeded\
Metric: Percentage of 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 1' out of all 'Manuscript Export Succeeded'

Name: Frequency of \Reviewer Invitation Reminder 1\ in relation to \Reviewer Invitation Reminder 2\
Metric: Percentage of 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 1' out of all 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 2'

Name: Percentage of cases receiving multiple \Reviewer Invitation Reminder 1\ before a \SW-Reviewer Agreed\
Metric: the average of the function base > 1 where base is the number of times `ACTIVITY` == 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 1' filtered by the function ma > 0 where ma is the number of times `ACTIVITY` == 'SW-Reviewer Agreed'

Name: Frequency of \Reviewer Invitation Reminder 1\ in manuscripts that do not proceed to \SW-Awaiting EIC Decision\
Metric: Frequency of activity 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 1' for cases where activity 'SW-Awaiting EIC Decision' does not occur

Name: Number of \Reviewer Invitation Reminder 1\ sent in each variant of the review process
Metric: ERROR: computing metric {'count': activity == 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 1'", 'aggregation': 'total', 'group_by': 'variant'}"
